urls.title: Travel Restrictions - COVID-19 Updates - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We know travel restrictions may change at short notice. That’s why we’re doing everything we can to keep you up-to-date with current COVID-19 travel requirements to help you plan ahead. Before you travel, make sure to review the latest travel restrictions to ensure you’re eligible to fly. We also highly recommend checking the official government website of your destination country for the latest information. Travel

data.text: Some airport codes are obvious, others not so much. Here’s a little challenge for all you globetrotters out there. How many airports can you match to these airport codes? data.text: Street food or Michelin restaurant, Airbnb or hotel — which would you go for? Some of us like to live it up when we travel, while others like to blend in. Both ways make for interesting travel adventures. Which do you enjoy?

#MoveBeyond – After 24 years of loyal service, we’re saying goodbye to B-HLJ, the world’s first Airbus A330. Once the world’s largest twinjet, it joined our fleet back in 1996. Flying for the last time on 17 July, B-HLJ concluded 63,900 hours and 26,983 cycles of service! https://t.co/FXVGD29P5D
@torquilm There is no update for Oct, please check back in Sept. -Vinci
@Sanjeev27818529 Hi there, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number, full name and email address that you made the booking so that we can further assist ? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

As of December 2019, all our cockpits are fully paperless. The digitisation of all manuals and paperwork saved 13.4 million kilograms of paper per year, reducing our carbon emission by 4000 tonnes. Learn more about our paperless cockpits at https://t.co/c4EfegGQf7 https://t.co/HBiw0JjWMi
@DhairyaSachdev Hi Dhairya, we do not have any flights between India and Hong Kong. -Vinci

@dilpree80342536 Hi there. Since we are Hong Kong base company, our flights are transit in Hong Kong only with transit restrictions in Hong Kong. If you have any enquiry about the itinerary you mentioned, you may need to contact Air India for further assist and checking. Thank you. - Anna
